name: MiMedics
tag_list: dentist, price-comparison, inverse-auction, spain, doctor-ratings, physician-reviews
overview:
MiMedics operates the platform “comparadentistas.com” for cost comparisons of dental treatments in Spain.

The service, based on the inverse auction model, provides registered users enter an existing cost estimate for a desired treatment or seeking a specific dental service. The users receive cost estimates from different dentists or dental clinics in their geographical area. To ensure a high quality of service and treatment, participating dentists are rated by the patients after they finished their therapy.

With comparadentistas.com MiMedics likes to contribute a price transparency in the local dentistry market that allow patients to find a good dentist and service for a cheaper price. Due an increasing number of dentists and clinics in Spain the platform fulfills the function of an easy customer acquisition. Furthermore positive ratings and reputation lead to future business and satisfied returning costumers.

Business Model MiMedics business model is based on retaining a commission from the dentist for every mediated treatment-lead. The business model is proven and highly scalable.

In economically difficult times cost reduction for individuals is a key; because it saves expenses for patients. Customer satisfaction in the healthcare industry is highly demanded and creates new customers and a customer binding for competitive dentists.

offices.address2: Parque Científico Tecnológico de la ULPGC - Edif 2
